description: A classic number puzzle game where you slide tiles to combine numbers and reach the 2048 tile. Perfect for developing logical thinking and strategic planning skills.

howToPlay: Use arrow keys (↑↓←→) or swipe to move all tiles in the specified direction
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one, doubling the value
Every move spawns a new tile (2 or 4) in an empty spot
Try to reach the 2048 tile to win the game
Continue playing after 2048 to achieve even higher scores

title: Words of Wonders
description: Explore world wonders while building words from letters. Perfect for vocabulary building and spelling practice with beautiful landmark backgrounds.

howToPlay: Connect letters to form words by dragging your finger or mouse
Find all hidden words to complete each level
Discover bonus words for extra points
Progress through different world landmarks and monuments
Use hints if you get stuck on difficult words

controls.mouse: Click and drag to connect letters and form words
controls.touch: Tap and swipe to connect letters on mobile devices
controls.keyboard: Use mouse to select letters, no keyboard input needed

tips: Start with shorter words to get familiar with available letters
Look for common prefixes and suffixes
Use the shuffle button to rearrange letters for new perspectives
Save hints for the most challenging levels

introduction: Words of Wonders combines word puzzle gameplay with educational content about world landmarks. Players build vocabulary while learning about famous monuments and cultural sites from around the globe.
features: Progressive difficulty with increasing word complexity
Bonus words for extra points and learning
learningObjectives: Expand English vocabulary and word recognition
Improve spelling and letter pattern recognition
Learn about world landmarks and cultural heritage
